short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rental cashflow calculator that lets you analyze deals using cashflowcalc.com - works on Zillow/Trulia/Redfin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As an investor, when browsing on Zillow/Trulia/Redfin, you often want to analyze each deal to see how the monthly cashflow and yearly return would look like. This extension adds a button to each property that allows you to easily start analyzing that deal on https://cashflowcalc.com
